Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbonauts,

I'm rather new in this forum, but I've been playing KSP since it came out. 

Anyway, My game is heavily modded, and theres a mod that keeps giving me trouble. As the title says, its BDAc. I dont currently have it installed, but its given me trouble in the past. The first time I installed it, it Kraken'd my save file and corrupted my entire game.

The second and third time i downloaded it ( third time from spacedock, first and second from curseforge), it worked but i couldnt right-click anything except the Rotary Launchers and Adjustable Missile Rails. 

 

Anyone able to help?

Thanks A Million.
